headline: FullStack Appoints Anton Tomchenko as Chief Executive Officer
summary: NEW YORK, October 29, 2025--Bregal Sagemount ("Sagemount" or the "Firm"), a leading growth-focused private capital firm, and FullStack ("FullStack" or the "Company"), a leading software engineering and AI solutions company powered by AI-ready talent across the Americas, today announced the appointment of Anton Tomchenko as Chief Executive Officer. Tomchenko brings more than two decades of technology and leadership experience, highlighted by 18 years at EPAM Systems and subsequent executive roles

raw.summary: NEW YORK, October 29, 2025--Bregal Sagemount ("Sagemount" or the "Firm"), a leading growth-focused private capital firm, and FullStack ("FullStack" or the "Company"), a leading software engineering and AI solutions company powered by AI-ready talent across the Americas, today announced the appointment of Anton Tomchenko as Chief Executive Officer. Tomchenko brings more than two decades of technology and leadership experience, highlighted by 18 years at EPAM Systems and subsequent executive roles
